text"},"accessToken":{"type":"string","description":"The access token used for authentication with external providers.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"serializedProfile":{"type":"string","description":"The serialized user profile data, if applicable.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"code":{"type":"string","description":"The code for two-factor authentication.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"codeOAuth":{"type":"string","description":"The authorization code used for obtaining OAuth tokens.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"session":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether the authentication is session-based.","example":true},"confirmData":{"type":"object","properties":{"email":{"type":"string","description":"The email address to confirm the user's identity.","format":"email","nullable":true,"example":"Sydney_Roberts4@hotmail.com"},"first":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether this is the first access to the user's account.","nullable":true,"example":true},"key":{"type":"string","description":"The unique confirmation key for validating user identity.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The additional confirmation data required for authentication.","title":"ConfirmData"},"recaptchaType":{"oneOf":[{"enum":["Default","AndroidV2","iOSV2","hCaptcha"],"type":"string","description":"[Default - Default, AndroidV2 - AndroidV2, iOSV2 - iOSV2, hCaptcha - hCaptcha]","example":"Default"},{"enum":[0,1,2,3],"type":"integer","description":"[0 - Default, 1 - AndroidV2, 2 - iOSV2, 3 - hCaptcha]","example":0,"x-enum-varnames":["Default","AndroidV2","iOSV2","hCaptcha"],"x-enum-descriptions":["Default","AndroidV2","iOSV2","hCaptcha"]}],"description":"The type of CAPTCHA validation used.","title":"RecaptchaType"},"recaptchaResponse":{"type":"string","description":"The user's response to the CAPTCHA challenge.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"culture":{"type":"string","description":"The culture code for localization during authentication.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The parameters required for the user authentication requests.","title":"AuthRequestsDto"}}}}}
